description: These thick, sweet & smoky slow cooked vegan baked beans need a little initial prep then you can leave them to do their thing while you do yours. You will be rewarded with a comforting & delicious pot of the most amazing baked beans with rich, deep & complex flavours.
keywords: vegan baked beans, vegetarian baked beans
name: Vegan Barbecue Baked Beans
recipeIngredient: 300g / 1.5 cups of small dried white beans
3 large cloves of garlic (, chopped finely)
28oz / 793g / 3 cups canned crushed tomatoes (see recipe note)
1/2 teaspoon chilli flakes or powder (to give flavour not heat)

recipeInstructions.text: First you need to cook your soaked beans (see recipe notes if you forgot to soak them) Drain off the soaking water, cover with fresh water and bring to a boil then simmer until the beans are just tender. 60 - 90 minutes should do it. If you are using canned beans skip this step. Once the beans have cooked, drain them and then continue onto the steps below depending on your cooking method.
